aboutMeText: Hello, I am Dieter von Stein. I am a mechanical engineer with experience in method planning and process planning. My goal is to develop innovative solutions to increase the efficiency and performance of our production. In addition to my main job, I have discovered a passion for front-end development in my spare time. Designing appealing user interfaces has become an exciting hobby that complements my technical skills and encourages creative approaches to solutions.
aboutMeSecond: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!
portfolioText: Feel free to try out my latest development projects and look into their code . .
projectJoinText: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
projectPolloText: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
contactFirstText: Want to discuss a new project?
contactSecondText: Say hello! Let's discuss your ideas and make it happen

projectPokedex: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
